attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded this app it communicated with all of my other household appliances, just like in G-force, and killed my entire family including me. my coffee machine and fridge then continued murdering my neighbors and they soon will take over the world. i think trump may have had something to do with this.
attributes.title: it’s a no from me❤️

attributes.review: It says if we sign up we can check in to events, and receive champaign texts but who would wanna go? And to share with friends, but im pretty sure they all know about this app they just dont wanna download it because whats the point. Redeem points and get a prize? What would my prize be?
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I got this app to keep up with our president but my phone started glitching once I downloaded it and it started using my location in the background which is weird because there is no reason that this app needs my location.
attributes.title: never again

attributes.review: so this app and its creators actually ended up crashing not only my phone, but allowed countless to die from a virus because of lack of leadership, and are too afraid of a bunch of teenagers to speak up and fix things. they ALSO crashed my rights by literally violating them with their ideas.
attributes.title: crashed my phone

attributes.review: after having this app for about two days i got notified that my apple ID was being used for some hi tech device in washington DC and the only app i had been using is this trump app. i am beyond mad and don’t know what to do. the app also crashed within the first few minutes of me downloading it. worst. app. ever!!
attributes.title: STEALS INFORMATION

attributes.review: Why is this app making my phone crash out of nowhere ?? I had never had any issues and I’m guessing it’s one of those apps that bring in viruses to your phone. Unless you want to have a slow and glitchy phone, don’t download this app. If I could put ZERO stars I WOULD!
attributes.title: Terrible experience

attributes.review: This app is horrible! It took 2 days to download and then when it finally finished it continued to close itself, after I tried multiple times to open it. It even hates itself. Never again will I use this app. No point in this being in the app store!
attributes.title: Just bad

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see what his plans were for the 2020 election but once i downloaded this app it COMPLETELY removed all of my photos and my contacts i went to the apple store and they said because of this app i have lost all of those memories forever they were unable to recover my photos NEVER BUY THIS APP
attributes.title: BAD
